summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of Dawson Street, from Bowen Place to 44th Avenue South; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Majority Petition No. 113349 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment of said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by mode of "Payment by Bonds".
